Change the Record by Paul Cocksedge

Change the Record by Paul Cocksedge

In this interview filmed at Dezeen Space, London designer Paul Cocksedge explains the ideas behind Change the Record, a project where vinyl records are moulded into amplifiers for smartphones.

See more of Dezeen’s architecture and design movies here: http://www.dezeen.com/tag/dezeen-movies/
